item.title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate: IAM
item.author: niossoft@gmail.com (Kevin Liu)
item.description: AWS has Global Services: Identity and Access Management(IAM) Route 53(DNS service) CloudFront(Content Delivery Network) WAF(Web Application Firewall) Most AWS services are Region-scoped: Amazon EC2(Infrastructure as a Service) Elastic Beanstalk(Platform as a Service) Lambda(Function as a Service) Rekognition(Software as a Service) NOTICE: Must to make sure region-scoped services are available in your region. In oreder to best peformance, please choice the region geographically close to you. IAM Section IAM = Identity and Access Management, Global service
item.dc:creator: Kevin Liu

item.title: How push your Hugo project on Github?
item.author: niossoft@gmail.com (Kevin Liu)
item.description: Deploy going to your hugo project path and check the cmd below, you can preview your blog content before push it on the remote repository. 1 hugo server --disableFastRender Git 1 2 3 4 git init git add . git commit -m "your comment messages" git push -u origin main
item.dc:creator: Kevin Liu

item.title: The SpringBoot Starters Conflict in pom.xml
item.author: niossoft@gmail.com (Kevin Liu)
item.description: Troubleshooting To open eclipse project in the Intellij IDE, I’m getting no-error when trying to Build it up. But when I am trying run using Maven to run this project start getting message below. Closing JPA EntityManagerFactory for persistence unit ‘default’ HikariPool-1 - Shutdown initiated, HikariPool-1 - Shutdown completed Solution I find the solution on stackoverflow. Maybe you can check your pom.xml, if it contains BOTH the spring-boot-starter-web and spring-boot-starter-tomcat dependencies.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Liu
